name: Don't Touch The Moving Parts
description:
It's not easy being a fragile little Stickman in a warning sign. Everything can (and probably will) kill you, so stay alert, move with caution and always remember: Don't Touch the Moving Parts!

Don't Touch the Moving Parts is a short platformer, fitting every level in a single screen. Controls are easy to learn and hard to master, physics are not your friend.

Mild content warning: Contains lots of (badly) animated blood

This game is in development, more levels and features will be provided in the future
